Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text:
My overall impression: ok food, but poor service.
We didn't have a good experience even though the place was not too busy. I had bacon in my omelette even though I asked for a vegetarian version. We had to wait …

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: One of our favorite restaurants on our trip to Amsterdam. We stopped for breakfast. There is plenty of outside seating. The service was excellent. We both had the French breakfast. The bread was warm and soft! The coffee was so good.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Because of its location, service is slow. Depending on the time, tables could be hard to get. Beer selection is pretty good. Location and ambiance is amazing, especially with Kadinsky’s around the corner. Food was better than decent. The staff seems overwhelmed but still pleasant.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text:
The service was great but the food was  disappointing.
The parmigiana is not parmigiana.
The penne pasta with prawns, the prawns are not fresh and taste of frozen and …

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Very nice and not so expensive food. Service was nice and breakfast that we have ordered was delicious. My friend is gluten intolerant and he said that the bread he received was the best gluten free bread he has ever had.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Love this place! Most service was quick and friendly, amazing food and what a view! Highly recommended.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Excellent place with a beautiful atmosphere. Food is great with big portions and tasty. Terrace has a good position to drink or eat and see the people walking. I recommend fried eggs with bacon and cheese. One glass of wine is between 4 and 5 euro.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Stopped here to kill time before meeting a friend. I had a cup of tea and a croissant, heaters were on outside and sat out on the terrace watching people go about there business. Tea and croissant were so good when I had finished I went …

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Great location, tasty food and a very good service

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: loved my river cruise, you get blanket keep you warm and as much to drink for free wine beer tea coffee hot chocolate and a guided tour telling you all points of interest,

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Cold not have asked for a better breakfast. Fast and friendly service. Delicious food with freshly squeezed orange juice and coffie that wakes you up in the morning :)

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text:
Absolutely delicious food, hamburger was incredible. Staff was wonderful.

Such a good location too, will come back many times with friends visiting Amsterdam!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Super place to have coffee, beer, wine and tasty food, with the nicest guys to serve you, in an iconic place of Amsterdam - Rokin!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Great food. Just had too many wasps which made it unpleasant but that's nature 😅

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Nice coffee, large heated terrace, service was quick and friendly, and the bitterballen delicious! Love the mini waffle that comes with the coffee!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text:
Location is right next to Metro 52 station.
They serve italian coffee.
Quick service. …

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Awesome place to eat a delicacy and have a nice hot beverage. Plus, people working there are kind.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Lovely outdoor dining area perfect for catching up with friends

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Great outdoor space, service was exceptional and so was our food. Had a nice lunch with friends here.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text:
I order just an espresso and a cheesecake slice but it's a really nice place, comfortable and welcoming.
Espresso is Illy so a guarantee even for Italians.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Restaurant for tourists where you can eat close to the center of the city. The prices are good and the food is nice.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Worst service ever. Not a tasty food also.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Nice location, good food. Cappuccino was a bit small, nothing too special. I had a Uitsmijter with cheese and bacon. My only real complaint is that I waited almost 15 minutes for a waitress to take my order. I had to get up and go to the cash register and ask for someone to take my order...

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Recommend to try Espresso Martini, amazing cocktail. Food is great. Great service, has Wi-Fi good view.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Really good steak sandwich and spaghetti Arabiatta.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Great service provided by all staff and food was delivered promptly not to mention how delicious it was 😋

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text:
Get the bacon Dutch pancake!!
The staff was so kind and offered lovely suggestions.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Good service, cool temperature and nice food.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Good meals, friendly staff

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: A nice and cosy cafe restaurant located in the heart of Amsterdam, with a nice lunch menu and a discent drinks selection offering an impeccable service.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Very nice place: Great food and super friendly staff.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: I love the Illy coffee. Coffee was really good, I recommend it.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Staff was very kind and courteous.  Nice clean environment and prices were very reasonable

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Nice location, fast service, good food!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Food and service was great!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Amazing find. Went twice on our last trip to Amsterdam. The food was first class. Very fresh and plenty of it. Extremely good value for money. Would definately go back.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Fantastic cafe. Had a great lunch here including a world-class gazpacho. Reasonably priced, friendly staff.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Quite nice place. Quite nice food. Situated not far from the train station in the centre of Amsterdam. Expected it to be more expensive than it was. Very busy as is to be expected given its location.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Very nice and cosy place. Location is very good.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Best apple tart in the world!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Good selection of beers including Sol and a beer from a local brewery in Amsterdam called Biri that has very nice tropical flavors.    Nice place to sit outside and crosswalk at a very busy street with the Rokin subway and above ground Tram …

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Enjoyed the view and the good cappuchino. Friendly staff !

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: I got a burger and fries, my travel companion got the eggplant lasagna. Both were delicious and priced well for what they were. Would reccomend.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Bacon pancakes are gorgeous!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Good food, cozy place, warm staff

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Amazing service by Gaby and Abuda, thanks a lot for making our day! Great food, affordable price. I recommend the (home made) apple pie.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Last night tried to take shelter from a heavy shower under the outside canopy.  I did not sit down, but despite the fact that there were no customers on the terrace (because of the rain) the waitress insisted that I order something if I …

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Great place for breakfast or lunch. Tasty food, and especially the service was very good.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Nice and clean with a pleasant atmosphere. Besides the outdoor seats you'll find a lot of room inside. Nice prices and fresh food.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Very nice to enjoy some drinks/ food

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Amazing breakfast. A little expensive, but it's just perfect. I would definitely eat there again.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Nice location, even though it is in tourist area, the most of the visitors are locals, at least during the lunch @1st floor. They serve typical Dutch winter soup. Erwtensoep for euro 6.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: 5 stars !

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Friendly staff, we had a great night drinking here and getting to know the staff, right by a canal with lots of heated lamps outside, beautiful views and great service

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Horrible waitress. They should fire the tall blonde one and hire better staff. So rude and unfriendly... I felt like trash.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: In the middle of the old city, a warm coffee  overlooking the busiest street of Amsterdam is a must do, in an European atmosphere. Great sandwich with avocado and Crispín bacon.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: The service was great, even though the place was very busy. We had coffees and pancakes, everything was delicious.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: great place! food is delicious, staff very friendly. we love this place!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Nice for lunch. Food is good. Prices maybe a bit high, but not extraordinary. Nice location that will be nicer when construction work in the area is finalized.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Food was ok, prices a bit high as expected. Location is very good. Staff wasn't very pleasant and didn't seem to enjoy children.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: I only had drinks here, but the service was good and friendly, and...if you pick a place by the window you have a great view of the Rokin and Amstel. Especially on the first floor!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text:
Apparently, we were forgotten. After waiting an hour we left even more hungry.

All people around us got there food and after people who came in 20 mins after us. We complained. After this, the food still didn’t arrive. We left unsatisfied....

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Good bfast food, decent prices. Been going here every trip i travel here. This place always deliver :)

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Good service, great quality food. Many tourists though, but that's because of the location of the restaurant.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: The food was the best ever. The service was very slow. Extremely slow and we where the only 2 people there.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Very nice place, excellent service, COVID measures are fully respected, good beers.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Decent place to sit and drink. But not much view to watch Amsterdam pass by.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Real Amsterdam atmosphere, friendly staff, good coffee and great apple pie! Nice sunny terrace with sun (rare in Amsterdam)

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Cozy and friendly service with a great view.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Fantastic atmosphere, unheard of good service, excellent food!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Ordered a vegetarian lasagna for 12 euro, and half of the dish turned out to be 4 small slices of white bread.. (without butter or anything)

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: The quantity of food is poor in the plates but the price is not low. Burgers are not served with fries (or you have to pay more). Service not very kind anymore.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Always very good and very big plates.

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Club sandwich was great! Hot chocolate cinno was one of the best I have tried! Highly recommended!

Name: Brasserie Meuwese
Review Text: Best burger I have had in decades. Don't be fooled by its 'ordinary' appearance..
